languages.text: Согласно затертым глифам, статуя изображает некоего эльдарского героя, создавшего сотню миров и вдвое больше звезд.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Игрок понимает что композиция статуй изображают историю расы Аэльдари 3

languages.text: According to the faded glyphs, the statue depicts an Aeldari hero who created a hundred worlds and twice as many stars.
languages.original_text: Согласно затертым глифам, статуя изображает некоего эльдарского героя, создавшего сотню миров и вдвое больше звезд.

traits.locale_text: According to the faded glyphs, the statue depicts an Aeldari hero who created a hundred worlds and twice as many stars.
According to the faded glyphs, the statue depicts an Aeldari hero who created a hundred worlds and twice as many stars.
According to the faded glyphs, the statue depicts an Aeldari hero who created a hundred worlds and twice as many stars.
According to the faded glyphs, the statue depicts an Aeldari hero who created a hundred worlds and twice as many stars.
According to the faded glyphs, the statue depicts an Aeldari hero who created a hundred worlds and twice as many stars.

languages.text: D'après les glyphes partiellement effacés, la statue représente un héros aeldari ayant engendré une centaine de mondes et deux fois plus d'étoiles.
languages.original_text: According to the faded glyphs, the statue depicts an Aeldari hero who created a hundred worlds and twice as many stars.

traits.locale_text: D'après les glyphes partiellement effacés, la statue représente un héros aeldari ayant engendré une centaine de mondes et deux fois plus d'étoiles.

languages.text: 色あせた象形文字によれば、この像は100の世界とその2倍の星を創造したアエルダリの英雄を描いている。
languages.original_text: According to the faded glyphs, the statue depicts an Aeldari hero who created a hundred worlds and twice as many stars.

traits.locale_text: 色あせた象形文字によれば、この像は100の世界とその2倍の星を創造したアエルダリの英雄を描いている。

languages.text: 根据褪色的文字记载，这尊雕像描绘的艾达灵族英雄创造了一百个世界与两百颗星星。
languages.original_text: According to the faded glyphs, the statue depicts an Aeldari hero who created a hundred worlds and twice as many stars.

traits.locale_text: 根据褪色的文字记载，这尊雕像描绘的艾达灵族英雄创造了一百个世界与两百颗星星。

languages.text: Laut den verblichenen Glyphen stellt die Statue einen Aeldari-Helden dar, der einhundert Welten und doppelt so viele Sterne erschaffen hat.
languages.original_text: According to the faded glyphs, the statue depicts an Aeldari hero who created a hundred worlds and twice as many stars.

traits.locale_text: Laut den verblichenen Glyphen stellt die Statue einen Aeldari-Helden dar, der einhundert Welten und doppelt so viele Sterne erschaffen hat.

languages.text: A juzgar por los desvaídos glifos, la estatua representa a un héroe Aeldari que creó un centenar de mundos y el doble de estrellas.
languages.original_text: According to the faded glyphs, the statue depicts an Aeldari hero who created a hundred worlds and twice as many stars.

traits.locale_text: A juzgar por los desvaídos glifos, la estatua representa a un héroe Aeldari que creó un centenar de mundos y el doble de estrellas.

languages.text: Silikleşmiş gliflere göre bu heykel; yüz dünya ve iki yüz yıldız yaratmış, kahraman bir Aeldari'yi tasvir etmekte.
languages.original_text: According to the faded glyphs, the statue depicts an Aeldari hero who created a hundred worlds and twice as many stars.

traits.locale_text: Silikleşmiş gliflere göre bu heykel, yüz dünya ve iki yüz yıldız yaratan bir Aeldari kahramanını tasvir etmekte.
